pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============Pyrew=============Welcome to Pyrew, a Python library that provides a way to write shorter and more efficient Python code.Installation------------Stable------------1. Run the following command:.. code-block:: bash pip install pyrew2. At the top of your file, add the following code:.. code-block:: python import pyrew pyrew = pyrew.Pyrew() Development------------1. Run the following command:.. code-block:: bash pip install git+https://github.com/AquaQuokka/pyrew.git2. At the top of your file, add the following code:.. code-block:: python import pyrew pyrew = pyrew.Pyrew()
